fields.caption: Marble head of the Amazon warrior-queen Penthesilea, a Roman copy of the Hellenistic original, in “A World of Emotions: Ancient Greece, 700 B.C.-200 A.D.,” at the Onassis Cultural Center New York.
A funerary stele with a poignant scene, early third century B.C., from the cemetery of Ancient Thera (Santorini).
